This is the abbreviation for Isle Metadata Initiative (https://www.mpi.nl/imdi/). Typically this probably does not need to be localized.

trans-unit.source: {0} ({1}) is a metadata standard to describe multi-media and multi-modal language resources. The standard provides interoperability for browsable and searchable corpus structures and resource descriptions.
trans-unit.note: Parameter 0 is 'Isle Metadata Initiative' (the first occurrence will be turned into a hyperlink); Parameter 1 is 'IMDI'
trans-unit.target: {0} ({1}) is a metadata standard to describe multi-media and multi-modal language resources. The standard provides interoperability for browsable and searchable corpus structures and resource descriptions.

trans-unit.source: This tool will help you use {0} to archive your {1} data. When the {1} package has been created, you can launch {0} and enter any additional information before doing the actual submission.
trans-unit.note: Parameter 0 is the name of the program that will be launched to further prepare the IMDI data for submission; Parameter 1 is the name of the calling (host) program (SayMore, FLEx, etc.)
trans-unit.target: This tool will help you use {0} to archive your {1} data. When the {1} package has been created, you can launch {0} and enter any additional information before doing the actual submission.

trans-unit.note: For more formal cultures, something less cheeky might be better. In most cases, this will be replaced by a more useful message, but there are situations where a user could see this.
For more formal cultures, something less cheeky might be better. In most cases, this will be replaced by a more useful message, but there are situations where a user could see this.

trans-unit.source: If you don't care who reads your bug report, you can disregard this notice.
trans-unit.target: If you don't care who reads your bug report, you can disregard this notice.

trans-unit.source: When you submit a crash report or other issue, it goes into our issue tracking system, "Jira", which is available via the web at https://jira.sil.org/issues.(This is a normal way to handle issues in an open-source project.)
trans-unit.target: When you submit a crash report or other issue, it goes into our issue tracking system, "Jira", which is available via the web at https://jira.sil.org/issues.(This is a normal way to handle issues in an open-source project.)

trans-unit.source: Our issue-tracking system is not searchable by those without an account. Therefore, search engines (like Google) will not find your bug reports.
trans-unit.target: Our issue-tracking system is not searchable by those without an account. Therefore, search engines (like Google) will not find your bug reports.

trans-unit.source: However, anyone can make an account and then read your report. So if you have something private to say, please send it to one of the developers privately with a note that you don't want the issue in our issue tracking system. If necessary, we can make a place-holder for your issue without the private information so the issue can still be tracked and not get lost.
trans-unit.target: However, anyone can make an account and then read your report. So if you have something private to say, please send it to one of the developers privately with a note that you don't want the issue in our issue tracking system. If necessary, we can make a place-holder for your issue without the private information so the issue can still be tracked and not get lost.

trans-unit.source: Did you know that there is a new version of this collection which lets you search in Arabic, Bengali, Chinese, English, French, Indonesian, Hindi, Portuguese, Spanish, Thai, or Swahili? It is free and available for downloading.

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, {0} is starting to get short of memory, and may soon slow down or experience other problems. We recommend that you quit and restart it when convenient.
trans-unit.target: দুরভাগ্যবশত , {0}–এর মেমরি স্বল্পতা দেখা দেওয়া শুরু হয়েছে, এবং খুব শীঘ্র ধীর গতির হতে পারে অথবা অন্যান্য সমস্যার সম্মুখীন হতে পারেন। আমরা পরামর্শ দেই যে আপনার সুবিধা মতো আপনি কম্পিউটারটি বন্ধ করুন এবং রিস্টার্ট করুন।

trans-unit.target: কিম্যান 5.0 অথবা পরবর্তী সংস্করণ ইনস্টল নেই।

trans-unit.source: Select the &keyboard with which to type {0} text
trans-unit.target: {0} লেখা টাইপ করার জন্য &কীবোর্ডটি নির্বাচন করুন

trans-unit.source: &Test Area (Use this area to type something to test out your keyboard.)
trans-unit.target: &পরীক্ষা ক্ষেত্র (আপনার কীবোর্ডটি পরীক্ষা করার জন্য এই ক্ষেত্রটি ব্যবহার করুন)
এসএলডিআর এর সাথে সংযুক্ত হতে পারছে না

trans-unit.source: The application is unable to connect to the SIL Locale Data Repository to retrieve the latest information about this language. If you create this writing system, the default settings might be incorrect or out of date. Are you sure you want to create a new writing system?
trans-unit.target: এই ভাষা সম্পর্কে সাম্প্রতিক তথ্য পুনরুদ্ধার করতে অ্যাপ্লিকেশনটি এসআইএল লোকাল ডাটা রিপোজিটরির সাথে সংযুক্ত হতে পারছে না। যদি আপনি এই লেখার প্রক্রিয়াটি তৈরি করেন, ডিফল্ট সেটিংসটি ভুল হতে পারে অথবা মেয়াদ উত্তীর্ণ হতে পারে। আপনি কি নিশ্চিত যে আপনি একটি লেখার নতুন প্রক্রিয়া তৈরি করতে চান?
